attributes.action: Have a Nicola Sturgeon statue in Westminster
attributes.background: I would like a Nicola Sturgeon statue build in the grounds of westminster

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the UK Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure whether you'd like a statue in Parliament or somewhere else in Westminster. 

Statues outside Parliament are not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the UK Government or Parliament to do.
